text:
Helm.ai | Onsite | Bay Area | Research Engineer, SWE, SRE

Helm.ai is building the next generation of AI technology for autonomous driving. On the road toward full stack L4/L5 AI software, we are productizing in the ADAS space with a superior L2 offering.

Check out our perception tech, which doesn't use any human annotation, and has placed #1 on the CVPR Lane Detection Benchmark: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLFx5mV1iY5vBu8yY70Ek5...

email vlad@helm.ai with your resume and why you want to work in this space.
